description.en: The content of the seminars is related to the objectives and learning outcomes of the course. Seminars are dedicated to sub-topics of the master's thesis proposal. An important role is given to discussions, feedback to each others' homeworks. Students get individual feedback to their projects and problems that emerge in the course of planning their research. Sub-topics covered at the seminars also depend on individual research interests of the students of the particular year.
description.et: Magistriseminaride sisu on seotud aine eesmärgi ja õpiväljunditega. Seminarides süvenetakse lähemalt igasse uurimistöö kavandi alapunktiga seotud teemasse. Seminarides on oluline osa aruteludel, üksteise kodutööde vastastikusel analüüsil. Üliõpilane saab jooksvalt tagasisidet oma uurimistöö eri etappidele ja tööprotsessi käigus esilekerkivate probleemidele. Seminarides käsitletavad alateemad sõltuvad ka magistrantide individuaalsetest uurimisteemadest.

objectives.en: The objective of the course is to prepare master's students for independent research and to give feedback to their projects. The focus is on different stages related to planning a master's studies research, specific problems involved in each stage are discussed in detail. The ability to motivate oneself and plan one's work independently is promoted. As the result of the course each student writes up an independent master's thesis research proposal.
objectives.et: Seminari eesmärgiks on valmistada üliõpilasi ette iseseisvaks uurimistööks oma magistritöö või eksamitöö raames ning annab sellele jooksvalt individuaalset tagasisidet. Keskendutakse planeeritava uurimistöö kavandi koostamise eri etappidele, lähemalt käsitletakse iga kavandi osaga seotud spetsiifilisi probleeme. Arendatakse enesemotivatsiooni ja töö iseseisva planeerimise oskust. Ainekursuse lõpuks valmib igaühel individuaalne uurimistöö kavand.

learning_outcomes.en: After successful completion of the course the student is able to:
plan an independent research project focusing on a manageable research topic during the master's studies
learning_outcomes.et: iseseisvalt planeerida akadeemilist uurimistööd piiritletud ja magistriõpingute raames teostataval teemal

learning_outcomes.en: critically analyse the literature related to the topic
plan the collection and analysis of the empirical material
learning_outcomes.et: kavandada teemakohase empiirilise materjali kogumist ja analüüsi

learning_outcomes.en: draft the schedule of the research process
